song.title: Do For Love
song.intro: [2pac:] Turn it up loud Hahaha, ahahaha, hey man You a little sucker for love, right? Word up, hahahahaha
song.verse: [2pac:] I shoulda seen You was trouble right from the start, taught me so many lessons How not to mess with broken hearts, so many questions When this began we was the perfect match, perhaps We had some problems but we workin at it, and now The arguments are gettin' loud, I wanna stay But I can't help from walkin' out just throw it away Just take my hand and understand, if /0 could see I never planned to be /0r man it just wasn't me But now I'm searchin' for commitment, in other arms I wanna shelter /0 from harm, /0n't be alarmed Your attitude was the cause, /0 got me stressin' Soon as I open up the /0or with /0r jealous questions Like where can I be /0're killin' me with /0r jealousy Now my ambition's to be free I can't breathe, cause soon as I leave, it's like a trap I hear /0 callin' me to come back, I'm a sucka for love
song.chorus: [Eric Williams:] What /0 won't /0, /0 for love You tried everything, but /0 /0n't give up What /0 won't /0, /0 for love You tried everything, but /0 /0n't give up
song.verse: [2pac:] Just when I thought I broke away and I'm feelin' happy You try to trap me say /0 pregnant and guess who the daddy Don't wanna fall for it, but in this case what could I /0? So now I'm back To makin promises to /0, tryin to keep it true What if I'm wrong, a trick to keep me holdin on Tryin' to be strong and in the process, keep /0 goin I'm bout to lose my composure, I'm gettin' close To packin' up and leavin' notes, and gettin' ghost Tell me who knows, a peaceful place where I can go To clear my head I'm feelin low, losin control My heart is sayin' leave, oh what a tangle web we weave When we conspire to conceive, and now You gettin' calls at the house, guess /0 cheatin' That's all I need to hear cause I'm leavin', I'm out the /0' Never no more will /0 see me, this is the end Cause now I know /0've been cheatin, I'm a sucka for love
song.chorus: [Eric Williams:] What /0 won't /0, /0 for love You tried everything, but /0 /0n't give up What /0 won't /0, /0 for love You tried everything, but /0 /0n't give up
song.verse: [2pac:] Now he left /0 with scars, tears on /0r pillow and /0 still stay As /0 sit and pray, hoping the beatings'll go away It wasn't always a hit and run relationship It use to be love, happiness and companionship Remember when I treated /0 good I moved /0 up to the hills, out the ills of the ghetto hood Me and /0 a happy home, when it was on I had a love to call my own I shoulda seen /0 was trouble but I was lost, trapped in /0r eyes Preoccupied with gettin' tossed, no need to lie You had a man and I knew it, /0 told me Don't worry bout it we can /0 it now I'm under pressure Make a decision cause I'm waitin', when I'm alone I'm on the phone havin' secret conversations, huh I wanna take /0r misery, replace it with happiness But I need /0r faith in me, I'm a sucka for love
song.outro:
[Eric Williams:] What /0 won't /0, /0 for love You tried everything, but /0 /0n't give up What /0 won't /0, /0 for love You tried everything, but /0 /0n't give up
What /0 won't /0, /0 for love You tried everything, but /0 /0n't give up What /0 won't /0, /0 for love You tried everything, but /0 /0n't give up What /0 won't /0, (/0 for love) You tried everything, but /0 /0n't give up What /0 won't /0, (/0 for love) You tried everything, but /0 /0n't give up Do for love, yeah baby yeah Do for love
